validation.validation: You can't change the user who runs the saved search or custom report for an existing cohort.
Specify a saved search that is owned by the user you submitted for Run As User Reference.
Specify an academic period for ending automatic membership updates that is valid for the academic unit and level.
Specify either a saved search or a custom report.
Specify a saved search that uses the Academic Records data source.
Specify a cohort type that exists on the institution.
To specify when Workday stops refreshing membership, enable Automatic Refresh for the cohort.
Specify a different name. A cohort with this name already exists for the academic unit: [name].
